name: Anti terrorist Modern Sniper the Elite Shooter 3D
name_original: Anti terrorist Modern Sniper the Elite Shooter 3D
description:
Anti terrorist Modern Sniper the Elite Shooter 3D

Free to Play & Download on GOOGLE Play Store.

Anti terrorist Modern Sniper the Elite Shooter 3D is not just a game, it is the next and most advance level of one person shooting experience.
Anti terrorist Modern Sniper the Elite Shooter 3D is totally new dimension in the war world.

Anti terrorist Modern Sniper the Elite Shooter 3D will take stimulated turn in every stem you will make.Anti terrorist Modern Sniper the Elite Shooter 3D is quite unpredictable and uncertain that make this game more attractive.

Realistic gaming sound effects, so you have a more perfect more realistic sniper experience. You will be a true sharpshooter!
The game has a ranking function, you and your friends can compare who is the real master sniper. Invite your friends together game, right? It will be very interesting.

In the application you will see - the city , the ruined city ,the war,sharpshooter scope , killer rifle , highlight, the ruins of the city.

key features:

=> Enjoy realistic gun simulation and animation!
=> Full addictive control of latest shooting sniper rifle
=> HD Music& Gameplay
=> Multiple Zoom scopic view
=>Excellent city 3D environment
